channel.title: CVE Feed for Emerson -- WirelessHART Gateway
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Emerson -- WirelessHART Gateway

item.title: CVE-2021-42536|2024-09-17T00:41:22.230Z -- emerson -- wirelesshart%20gateway
item.description: The affected product is vulnerable to a disclosure of peer username and password by allowing all users access to read global variables.

item.title: CVE-2021-42538|2024-09-17T00:11:59.293Z -- emerson -- wirelesshart%20gateway
item.description: The affected product is vulnerable to a parameter injection via passphrase, which enables the attacker to supply uncontrolled input.
